T02D2872:214a-1: n'i l'am bar dha ra badzra p'a ni s'a dha nam n'am /
T02D2872:214a-3: phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D2872:214a-4: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po khro bo gtum po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2872:214a-5: gdug pa 'dul mdzad klu rnams rgyan du mdzad //
T02D2872:214a-6: gtum zhing rngam pas gshin rje'i cha lugs 'dzin //
T02D2872:214a-7: kho rgyal gos sngon can la phyag 'tshal te /
T02D2872:214a-8: de yi sgrub thabs bdag nyid dran phyir bri //
T02D2872:214a-9: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nye bar bsgrub par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D2872:214a-10: gnas dben zhing nyams dga' ba'i sar mandal bya ba
T02D2872:214a-11: ni bu mo lo bcu drug lon pa lus sngo
T02D2872:214a-12: ba // sna nyag pa khro gnyer dang ldan pa /
T02D2872:214a-13: shin tu khros pa'i ngang tshul dang ldan pa sa len du bcug ste /
T02D2872:214a-14: lho nub mtshams nas sa sngon po'am nag po len du bcug pa //
T02D2872:214a-15: dri zhim po'i chu la srung ba'i sngags bzlas te /
T02D2872:214a-16: aom badzra p'a ni sa tva aartha siddhi ku ru raksha zhes btab la /
T02D2872:214a-17: mandal sngon po rgyar khru gang ba la /
T02D2872:214a-18: dpangs su mtho gang ba rtsigs te /
T02D2872:214a-24: so ba shing gi lo ma dri chus byugs la /
T02D2872:214a-25: me tog sngon po'am dri'i thig le dgu byas la /
T02D2872:214a-26: mchod rdzas rnams dgram par bya'o //
T02D2872:214a-27: de nas sgrub thabs ltar lha dgu'i rang bzhin bsgom mo //
T02D2872:214a-28: de'ang sgrub thabs las gnyal bcas la mchod do zhes
T02D2872:214b-0: pa ni @214b gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje'i sgrub
T02D2872:214b-1: thabs 'di'o // dpal phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin
T02D2872:214b-2: gyi gta' gtor 'di la brten la rtag tu sgrub
T02D2872:214b-3: pa ni gtor ma'i snod rin po che'i rgyu las
T02D2872:214b-4: thabs 'di'o // byas te / de'i nang du 'bras chan dang //
T02D2872:214b-6: gro la sogs pa las gtor ma byas te /
T02D2872:214b-9: mngar la sogs pas brgyan par bya'o //
T02D2872:214b-10: de'i nang du thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i gdan bsham pa'am //
T02D2872:214b-12: lam las ri rab bsams te /
T02D2872:214b-13: de'i steng du aa las thod pa'i sku mkhar //
T02D2872:214b-14: steng du ma las nyi ma /
T02D2872:214b-16: bdag nyid kyi thugs ka'i h'um las 'od 'phros te //
T02D2872:214b-17: bsgrub bya bkug ste thun mong ma yin pa'i gdan la bstim /
T02D2872:214b-18: yang 'od zer lcags kyu lta bu'i tsha tsha 'phros
T02D2872:214b-19: pas lha dang phral la gcer bu byang thang la
T02D2872:214b-20: bor ltar bsam / steng du h'um las gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon bskyed do //
T02D2872:214b-21: sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis g-yas rdo rje //
T02D2872:214b-24: smin ma glog stong 'od du 'gyur ba /
T02D2872:214b-25: dbu skra dmar ser gyen du bcings pa ste /
T02D2872:214b-26: rin po che dang sprul gyis brgyan pa /
T02D2872:214b-27: mig 'bras h'um las me'i phung po 'dra ba /
T02D2872:214b-28: zhal nas ha ha dang h'um h'um gi sgra sgrogs bas khams gsum pa brgyal bar byed pa /
T02D2872:214b-29: klu chen po brgyad kyis sku la rnam par brgyan pa /
T02D2872:214b-30: sku che la yan lag rags pa /
T02D2872:214b-31: ri rab la rnam par bzhugs pa ste /
T02D2872:214b-32: zhabs gnyis rgya mtsho'i gting du brkyang la /
T02D2872:214b-33: dbu bar snang gi khams na 'phyo ba /
T02D2872:214b-34: 'khor gnod sbyin dang srin po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba cig bskyed do //
T02D2872:214b-35: de ci 'dra pa cig ri rab brtse nas spyan drangs la phyag 'tshal //
T02D2872:214b-38: bstod pa dang 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba btab ste /
T02D2872:214b-39: ja:h'um bam ho: sa gnyis su med par bstims la /
T02D2872:214b-40: gta' bdag las kyi gnod sbyin phyag na rdo rje
T02D2872:214b-41: drag po'i sgo nas thugs rjes bzhugs bas gzas pa
T02D2872:214b-47: phrin las rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas bzhugs te /
T02D2872:214b-48: drag pos drag po sgrol bar bsam mo //
T02D2872:214b-49: de nas sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02D2872:214b-50: aom badzra p'a ni hri da yan h'um phat sv'ah'a /
T02D2872:215a-1: gnod sbyin gyi yang snying yin pas bsnyen pa'i dus su bdun 'bum nyi khri gdon no //
T02D2872:215a-2: mtshan ma bzang ba dang sgrub pa la 'jug ste /
T02D2872:215a-3: bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje'i nga rgyal gyis thugs
T02D2872:215a-4: ka'i h'um las 'od zer 'phros bas las kyi gnod
T02D2872:215a-5: sbyin gyi thugs dam bskul te 'od zer dmar po
T02D2872:215a-7: gzas pa po bsreg pa dang sdig pa la sogs pa sbyangs te /
T02D2872:215a-8: slar bdag nyid kyi thugs kar thim pa bsam /
T02D2872:215a-9: aom yaksha n'i l'am bar dha ra badzra p'a ni h'um /
T02D2872:215a-10: ma h'a yaksha se n'a pa ta ye /
T02D2872:215a-11: che ge mo aa mu ka sya m'a ra ya
T02D2872:215a-12: h'um phat ces sngags bzlas pas zhal nas sngags kyi
T02D2872:215a-13: phreng ba me'i 'od dang bcas te las kyi lha'i
T02D2872:215a-14: zhal du thim / thugs ka nas 'thon te /
T02D2872:215a-15: slar bdag nyid kyi snying gar thim ste /
T02D2872:215a-16: sngags kyi phreng bas bskor bas gzas pa po sngags kyi phreng bas bsregs shing 'dul bar bya'o //
T02D2872:215a-17: sgrub brtags bzang ba dang las la sbyar te /
T02D2872:215a-20: me 'bar klong chen dkyil du gzir //
T02D2872:215a-21: bsam gtan rdo rje thogs pa yis //
T02D2872:215a-22: gdul bya'i steng du dbab par bya //
T02D2872:215a-23: zhes gsungs las bsregs bskrad bcom btags par bsam //
T02D2872:215a-24: dmar lam bstan pa ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi dgongs pa bya zhing drag sngags bzlas te /
T02D2872:215a-26: bi buddha ma h'a pr'a pta /
T02D2872:215a-27: ha ra ha ra n'a ga n'am /
T02D2872:215a-28: pra ha ra pra ha ra n'a ga n'am /
T02D2872:215a-29: tstshinda tstshinda n'a ga hri da ya ni /
T02D2872:215a-30: bhinda bhinda n'a ga da m'a ni /
T02D2872:215a-31: pi si man dha n'a ga sha r'i ra ni /
T02D2872:215a-35: n'a ga bi da ra na h'um phat /
T02D2872:215a-36: n'a ga autstsha ta n'a ya h'um phat /
T02D2872:215a-37: n'a ga m'a ra na sod sod /
T02D2872:215a-38: n'a ga m'a ra na bying bying /
T02D2872:215a-39: n'a ga m'a ra na mugs mugs //
T02D2872:215a-40: n'a ga m'a ra na ha la ha la /
T02D2872:215a-41: n'a ga m'a ra na shig shig /
T02D2872:215a-42: n'a ga m'a ra na du na du na /
T02D2872:215a-43: n'a ga m'a ra na myos myos /
T02D2872:215a-44: bying bying thum ri li li dza: zhag nyi shu
T02D2872:215a-45: rtsa gcig tu mi yengs mi myur bar smra ba
T02D2872:215a-46: gcad do // ting nge 'dzin gyi dgongs pa gsal la drag por bya'o //
T02D2872:215a-47: kha zas kyi dus la bab pa 'am ldang bar
T02D2872:215a-48: 'dod na ye shes sems dpa' che la mchod pa
T02D2872:215a-51: las kyi lha la gtor ma dbul ba ni phyag
T02D2872:215a-52: na rdo rje'i thugs ka'i h'um las aa las bandha'i
T02D2872:215b-0: @215b 'og tu yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor de'i
T02D2872:215b-1: steng du ram las me gru gsum /
T02D2872:215b-3: de'i steng du bandha'i gzhal yas khang //
T02D2872:215b-4: de'i nang du sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga /
T02D2872:215b-8: sha lnga bdud rtsi lngar gyur pas mchod //
T02D2872:215b-9: rtsa sngags la ba lim ta kh'a hi zhes btags la dbul /
T02D2872:215b-10: las kyi dus su gtor ma sha khrag tu dmigs la dbul /
T02D2872:215b-11: rtsa sngags lam ma sarba sha tr'um btags la dbul //
T02D2872:215b-14: kha zas dus la bab na lus kyi lha la thugs dam gtad /
T02D2872:215b-16: gta'i gtor ma gtong na gtor ma bka' las phab
T02D2872:215b-17: la no bi ka ltar bskul tshig dang bcas la
T02D2872:215b-18: gtang ngo // gta' bdag gshegs su gsol //
T02D2872:215b-20: gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs //
